ValidationRule.description: Makes sure the Sales guys notate the Conversion Type when selling a Conversion Plan.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won") && ISPICKVAL( Product_Type__c , "401(k)" ) && ISPICKVAL( Plan_Type__c , "Conversion Plan" ) && ISPICKVAL( Conversion_Type__c , "") && CloseDate > DATE(2017,1,9) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Service_Option__c, "Custom(k) MML"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please indicate what type of Conversion Plan this is.
